name: PePiBo
description:
PePiBo (Peregrino Piñata Bowling) Is a VR bowling-puzzle game for Oculus Quest and Rift. Currently at prototype status. Every feedback and ideas are welcome! Leave your comments at the bottom!

Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/peregrinopinata

Grab your spirit animals and confront the dark forces of the Dragón del Fuego and its cursed Pin minions to protect your village from the explosion of Maconda Island's Volcano!

GAME HINTS and Instructions:

This game is at prototype phase and there is no in-game tutorial pay attention!

- You can grab with the side buttons or the trigger.

- You can move with the sticks

- Think BOWLING! We have already observed that the players tend to throw the ball in a parable. Instead throw it like a bowling ball, at the lowest point of your throw arc. It will improve the speed.

- Aiming in VR: We have already noticed that putting the same leg as the throwing arm before you improves accuracy. If you step forward with that let at the moment of throwing the ball also tends to improve the result of accuracy and speed.

- Everyone is different! If those hints do not work for you, try to find your way and give us your feedback on the comments below!
